CustomField.formula: (5 * ( FLOOR( ( (Candidate_Start_Date__c -1) - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( (Candidate_Start_Date__c -1) - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) ) - (5 * ( FLOOR( ( Candidate_s_First_Interview_Date__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( Candidate_s_First_Interview_Date__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Business days it took to successfully hire the candidate. (Candidate Start Date - Candidate's First Interview) **Calculation does not count either of the days in the calculation, only the business days in-between the two.
CustomField.label: Business Days to Hired
